alert.note: Alert for Callahan; Jones; Shackelford; Taylor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 08 at 6:01PM CDT until May 08 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Callahan County in west central Texas... Southeastern Jones County in west central Texas... Southwestern Shackelford County in west central Texas... Northeastern Taylor County in west central Texas... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 559 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hawley, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Abilene around 625 PM CDT. Hamby around 650 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Impact and Lake Fort Phantom Hill. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 285 and 287. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
